In England, in the seven days to 10 October, there were 217,023 new confirmed cases (383.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 October, there were 188,846 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 15% (28,177 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 October is 7,110,513 (12,573.8 cases per 100,000 population).
